items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame Boils Over For Hog Roast
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan are marked safe from pumpkin spice latte’s to bring you the most professional Notre Dame Football show. In this episode: And plenty more weaved in and out of the show.  Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast.

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Hot and Cold Takes VS Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: How’d We Do Last Week? Most Interesting I mean……I’d love to see it. Call this the Clover Formation. items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: It’s playoff football for Notre Dame from now until they lose. It actually started last week against Purdue, but the trick to these things is to do it one game at a time – one play at a time. The next challenge for the Irish is on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. Arkansas is […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Weather Report for Irish VS Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish travel to SEC country to take on the Arkansas Razorbacks. Back in August, there were a lot of us that thought this could very well be a ranked matchup and a game that might possibly be worthy of a visit from ESPN’s College Gameday. Instead, the Irish are just 1-2 […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Marcus Freeman is REBORN as an Italian-American
items.summary: Marcus Freeman took the podium on Monday as the Irish prepare to head south to take on the Arkansas Razorbacks.The Irish are coming off of a 56-30 win over Purdue, and the Razorbacks just lost their second game in a row — this time to the Memphis Tigers, 32-31.
